ai-ja240:1.2_0: and though he begged by it,
ai-ja240:2.2_0: and reflect on their mind’s side,
ai-ja240:2.3_0: From here they’ve gone to the King of Death,
ai-ja240:2.4_0: Here they’d come here to here again.”
ai-ja240:4.1_0: The Longer Discourse on the tenths.
ai-ja240:4.2_0: The ninth sub-chapter on the robe-making season is finished.
ai-ja240:6.3_0: We amused our best of men,
ai-ja240:6.4_0: a staple food, a drain, with tendons.
